1.content:
Italy, Viterbo

Angel, Star and Jade, three young girls, came here to visit their friend, John; in the mean time, Alex, a young boy, was running frantically for the streets, like he was chased by someone, and in the rush, he take a corner too much quickly and crash into Angel and Jade.
The three girls fall down on their back, while Alex fall ontop of them, touching their breasts with his hands; "HEY! WATCH IT!" said Angel, trying to get up "AAAHH! WHAT ARE YOU DOING!" said Jade, feeling the hand on her right breast: Alex was too embarassed to say anything, he was frozen!
Angel managed to push him aside and get up, then she put her foot on his back and say "what were you doing? you should watch where you're going!" she press the foot on his back hard, to punish him; meanwhile, Jade manage to get up too, and take a better look to the aggressor, and after a good look, while he's in pain for Angel's foot, she say "hey, are you ok? you seem kinda scared." so she lean her hand to him; Star wasn't under Alex, so she manage to get up easily and helped Jade to get up, unsure for what to say, until Jade spoke, so she say "yeah, you okay?" and lend a hand too, reaching for Alex's shoulder, and Angel raise her foot from him, to help him get up.
In the meantime, John, the italian man that Angel, Star and Jade came to see, is going out of his beloved home, worried for the girls since they still didn't show up, so he goes on to the search by feet, walking to the centre of the city, and after a corner of two, he manage to find them, so he speed up his pace to reach them.
Alex get up, helped by Angel, Star and Jade, and apologize to the girls "i-i-i'm so sorry, i j-j-just need to go." he said and started to walk away, but after only two steps, his path gets blocked by John that says "hey there, you must be a friend of my girls, nice to meet you, i'm John!"; john grab Alex's hand, and shake it vigorously to greet him, while Alex is stunned by all this events.
Unfortunately for all the group, they were causing all this commotion in front of a secret CIA base disguised in an old house, and something happened, because a flash of light came out of the windows, and invested our protagonists in a second!
John, Angel, Jade and Alex didn't have the time to understand what happened and became blind, seeing the white flash; slowly they regain sight, and wish they haven't!
Our protagonists look around, only to see an enormous window, a big chair, an enormous desk, a gigantic bed, a big night table and a colossal wardrobe; they were in a room for a giant!!
Alex start to panic, getting on his knees and looking to the ground, like frozen in fear; Angel was shocked, but managed to control herself, and said to Jade to explore the place: jade was shocked to death, but as soon as Angel spoke to her, she regain consciousness and start to climb the frontal left leg of the desk, to have a better view of the room; Star was very surprised, but when she sees Alex like that, she run to him, leaning near his shoulder and says"hey, are you okay? do you need a hand??"; John, well John always had a strange fantasy: find a giant girl and become her pet; he run all around the place, and when he see a thong, he jump on it, to smell it, but peace won't last long, even in this place....

Ten people will meet Skyler, a gente girl that will change destiny
info.description:
Hello there, fellow people!!
I'm going to present you: Skyler, a true goddess!
http://www.flickr.com/photos/101569568@N06/9720977596/in/photostream/
She is a gentle and kind girl, with the dream to grow up and become 100 miles tall!!!
Our goddes, will meet her dream soon enough, and change our destinies forever!

Four people, our protagonists, will meet this wonderful girl, and from that day, their destiny, as all the world's fate, will change forever!
But let me introduce our characters:

Angel
http://www.flickr.com/photos/101569568@N06/9720977886/
A 15 years old girl, an adventurer by nature, she will always try her best to move our protagonists on, and she's even the glue of them all, only Angel can calm down discussions, and motivate people!

Star
http://www.flickr.com/photos/101569568@N06/9722753668/
Friend to Jade and Angel, she loves videogames and care for everyone, leaving herself
for last; maybe she will understand her valor in this adventure, while she's busy healing
people!

Jade
http://www.flickr.com/photos/101569568@N06/9717939123/
The best friend of Angel, she loves to explore new places, and will help the group
with scouting and providing orientation info, but not only that...

Alex
Still no picture of him
He's a 19 years old boy that crashes against the first two girls, and find himself into this
adventure, he's a nice boy, and will be shocked for what will happen, but he has a
secret.....

John
http://www.flickr.com/photos/101569568@N06/9719174513/
A 23 years old man that search for a giant girl to worship, and soon he will find what he want, and much much more...

For now, i will end my info page here, since i still have to recruit friends to make the protagonists XD
info.pretty_title: Skyler, the new goddess of Viterbo!!
